name: Canadian Global Humanitatian Services
goal: Provide relief from poverty, and build and fund orphanages in countries exposed to war and calamities. Establish and deliver seminars to poverty stricken communities, in order to educate the young and increase the skill set of the workforce. Support business, markets and the community in developing infrastructure and establishing trade.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Communication, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Main EU initiatives, policies and legislative files related to charitable organizations involved with poverty stricken countries. Implementation of different projects, with an aim to stabilize social and humanitarian activities in Syria and Iraq.
